Content.Text:
<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mornin'! I brought the thank-you gift I promised.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
But...to be honest, I couldn't make what you
asked for. Turns out I need a bit more practice
before I'm able to handle a piece like that.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So I ended up making you a "Log Chair" instead.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I gave it my best shot, so I hope you're not too
let down. Aaaaanyway, I've gotta get back to
work. Come and visit again sometime!
